original_title: FLOSS Weekly Episode 783: Teaching Embedded with the Unphone
original_content:
This week Jonathan Bennett and Rob Campbell talk with Gareth Coleman and Hamish Cunningham! Its all about the Unphone, an open source handset sporting an ESP32, color touchscreen, and LoRa radio. Its open hardware, and used in a 3rd year university course to teach comp sci majors about hardware and embedded development.

https://unphone.net/

Did you know you can watch the live recording of the show right in the Hackaday Discord? Have someone youd like use to interview? Let us know, or contact the guest and have them contact us!
